description: An anglicisation of the French tricolore; the flag originated in France. Equivalent to tri- +â€Ž colour.

entries.meaning: A flag consisting of three stripes that are either vertical or horizontal; all of equal size, and of a different colour each.
examples: Tricolours are seen in the national flags of over twenty countries, including Belgium, France, India, Italy, Russia, The Netherlands and the Republic of Ireland.
